HI anyone care to explain a little better how this torrent works exactly? I'm used to keygens and random activators but this drag/drop feature got me confused here. Thanks in advance.

I was using  KIS 2013 beta for 90 days in Win 8 when the trial period has expired.

Then I opened  'the Licensing window' of the Kaspersky and deleted the key that was in use, clicked  'Activate the application' and then 
ran the 'Kaspersky 2013 Key Changer By Dev@nsh.exe' and dragged another key of  'Kaspersky 2013' into the 'Key Changer' then activated it over a new  test period of 90 days.

It seems it works even with new keys that already expired.

These keys were found by Google.

The test period of any final version of Kaspersky is 30 days.

To me it is working well, at least so far
